item.title: Dev says Switch 2’s physical Game Cards were too slow for Star Wars Outlaws port
item.description: Data transfer speeds are much lower for Switch 2 Game Cards than for downloaded games.

item.title: Donkey Kong Bananza is a worthy successor to Super Mario Odyssey’s legacy
item.description: Cathartic, punch-fueld land destruction is a cathartic showcase for Switch 2 hardware.
